element.definition: The subject of the questionnaire response.  This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc.  This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.
element.comment: If the Questionnaire declared a subjectType, the resource pointed to by this element must be an instance of one of the listed types.
element.requirements: Allows linking the answers to the individual the answers describe.  May also affect access control.
